name: 2_2_mini_example_NumericInput
content:
library(shiny)

## UI
ui <- fluidPage(
  numericInput(inputId = "my_input_count",
               label = "Your value:",
               value = 100),
  textOutput(outputId = "id.out"), ## placeholder for output
  textOutput(outputId = "id.out2")
)

## server
server <- function(input, output, session) {
  output$id.out <- renderText({
    aa.dot.bad.name <- paste0("You entered: ", input$my_input_count)
    aa.dot.bad.name
    
    })
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
